column2: ENGLISH
Lay an egg
Due to the unique biology of aboleths, they can fertilize their own eggs. The gestation process is a long one, however - five years - and another egg canot be lain until the current one hatches.
An egg is currently gestating.
An egg will be lain and will gestate for five years.
Ravage Territory
The gods despise stability and prosperity, especially that of those who do not placate them. Show these weaklings the error of their ways by razing all settlements to the ground.
Step down from power
In the eyes of both the people and the gods you have grown weak and most agree your time is past. If you were to step down, your heir would be seen more favourably.
Predecessor Abdicated
Celebrate Midwinter
Midwinter is the most sacred time of the year to [Root.AurilLoc], a joyful festival of ice-dancing to entice new worshippers.
Train in winter warfare
The Church of [Root.AurilLoc] often offers various services related to surviving winter to their faithful. One of these is training commanders on how to fight in cold weather.
Face [Root.AurilLoc]'s Embrace

One of the harshest rituals of the [Root.AurilLocAdj] faith is the Embrace, where a faithful must prove [Root.GetHerHis] devotion by surviving a full night in a magical blizzard while almost naked. Many die, but those favoured by the goddess are granted her blessing and survive.
[Root.AurilLoc]'s Protection
[Root.AurilLoc]'s Protection
Beseech [Root.AurilLoc] to make winter bearable on this location, increasing its prosperity in the cold months.
Train in [Root.GaragosLocAdj] tactics

The priests of [Root.GaragosLoc] are ever-willing to aid his faithful in becoming better at violence and killing, even if it is through the commanding of armies. For a show of devotion, they will share their secrets.
Train with [Root.GaragosLocAdj] priests
The priesthood of [Root.GaragosLoc] is more than willing to teach their war doctrines to the faithful in order to further the cause of their bloodied god.
Become a berserker
The faithful of [Root.GaragosLoc] can petition their god to grant them the ability of berserking, to embody his fury in combat, and out of it.
Seek Foe
[Root.GaragosLoc] demands violence and conflict. When in the lands of a foe, you may seek out one of its inhabitants to test your mettle against.
Must be on a province owned by either a rival, someone who has commited crimes against you, is at war with you, or is otherwise hostile.
You may only perform this action once every three months.
Arrange a Blood Festival
Unlike the rest of the weakling gods, [Root.GaragosLoc] does not have a fixed holy day. Instead any group of seven or more of his priests can declare a Blood Festival in his honour.
Blood Festivals can only be called once a year.
There are characters to duel in this province.
You may give the order to permanently blind [Root.GetName]. This is a common way of dealing with political rivals without outright killing them in the East, Shou-Lung and Zakhara.
You may give the order to castrate [Root.GetName]. This is a common way of dealing with political rivals without outright killing them in the East, Shou-Lung and Zakhara.
Reveal your lycanthrope nature
You tire of hiding what you are, reveal your true state as a lycanthrope to the world.
Establish a safe haven for lycanthropes
Make your court known as a place where lycanthropes can be accepted and fear no persecution for existing.
Randomly generated courtiers will be werecreatures of the same type as you.
Make [Root.GetBestName] into a lycanthrope
Approach [Root.GetBestName] and offer [Root.GetHerHim] the chance to become a lycanthrope like you. Prisoners don't have a choice.
Become lycanthrope
Propitiate [Root.MalarLoc] for the gift of lycanthropy, so that you may become closer to him.
Comission a pair of Claws of [Root.MalarLoc]
Contact the [Root.MalarLocAdj] priesthood to comission the creation of a pair of the weapons known as Claws of Malar for yourself.
Hold the Feast of the Stags
The Feast of the Stags is a yearly [Root.MalarLocAdj] celebration where the faithful hunt down animals and monsters and then set up a feast that any, even druids, can attend in safety.
The Feast can only be held once every few years.

You finally corner your quarry, and a fearsome one it is. The monster snarls and prepares to charge you with all its beastly might. This is going to be a tough fight, but such is the way of the Beastlord.
For the hunt!
Must be an enemy of Torm
Follows an enemy of the Seldarine pantheon
Can only be cast once every 5 years.
Call Celestial Army
§RAttention§!: High Magic is risky and can backfire in dire ways!\n\nCall forth a celestial army from Arvandor to fight against your enemies.
Summon Reverend One
§RAttention§!: High Magic is risky and can backfire in dire ways!\n\nSummon a fallen elven warrior from Arvandor to act as a commander in battle.
Nymph's Aura
§RAttention§!: High Magic is risky and can backfire in dire ways!\n\nMagically, and permanently, improves your physical appearance.
Transform into Baelnorn

§RAttention§!: High Magic is risky and can backfire in dire ways!\n\nHave your Selu'taar perform a ritual to transform you into a Baelnorn, a sacred elf lich. Baelnorns are not expected to be rulers, however, and you'll have to abdicate as part of the process.
Must be a master or higher in any class.
Worldweave

§RAttention§!: High Magic is risky and can backfire in dire ways!\n\nUtilize a high magic ritual to shape the lands of your demesne, causing one of the provinces under your control to gain an additional holding slot. Due to the volatility of the magic, which province is selected is random.
One of your provinces must have less than 7 holding slots.
Raise Mythal
§RAttention§!: High Magic is risky and can backfire in dire ways!\n\nRaise a mythal, a powerful, and permanent, high magic enchantment, over your capital.
Invite Fey
Invite a fey creature from the Feywild to join your court.
Can only be used every 3 years.
Invite Selu'taar
Invite a Selu'taar, or High Mage, to serve in your court and allow you access to the powerful High Magic rituals.
Must not have a previous high mage you invited present.
Join the Retreat
Abdicate your current holdings, bequeathing them to your heirs, and move to the far island of Evermeet to leave behind the tumult of Faerûn.
Evermeet must have Seldarine-worshipping elves ruling at least part of it.
Restore Delzoun
By restoring the fallen empire of Delzoun, you'll reclaim a part of the dwarven legacy that has fallen to the many enemies of your people.
You must hold the counties of Adbar, Sundabar, Felbarr, The Fork, and Arn Forest, and they all must be of your religion.
Restore Ammarindar
By restoring the fallen kingdom of Ammarindar, you'll reclaim a part of the dwarven legacy that has fallen to the many enemies of your people.
You must hold both the duchies of Ammarindar and Naurogloth.
Restore Besilmer
By restoring the fallen kingdom of Besilmer, you'll reclaim a part of the dwarven legacy that has fallen to the many enemies of your people.
You must hold the counties of Beliard, Red Larch, Ulutvin, Horn Hills, and Westwood, and they all must be of your religion.
Restore Dareth
By restoring the fallen kingdom of Dareth, you'll reclaim a part of the dwarven legacy that has fallen to the many enemies of your people.
You must hold the county of Dharvil, which must be of your religion, as well as the duchy of Ushar.
Restore Gharraghaur
By restoring the fallen kingdom of Gharraghaur, you'll reclaim a part of the dwarven legacy that has fallen to the many enemies of your people.
You must hold the duchy of Mirabar, and the counties of Mirabar, Starmetal Hills, Lyntara, Mt. Hotenow, and Khedrun Valley, and they all must be of your religion.
Restore Haunghdannar
By restoring the fallen realm of Haunghdannar, you'll reclaim a part of the dwarven legacy that has fallen to the many enemies of your people.
You must hold the counties of Leilon, Kryptgarden Forest, and Cony Gap, and they all must be of your religion.
Restore Ironstar
By restoring the fallen realm of Ironstar, you'll reclaim a part of the dwarven legacy that has fallen to the many enemies of your people.
You must hold the counties of Valley of Klaidson, Frost Hills, and Dark Arrow, and they all must be of your religion.
Restore Oghrann
By restoring the fallen kingdom of Oghrann, you'll reclaim a part of the dwarven legacy that has fallen to the many enemies of your people.
You must hold the counties of Darkhold, Veilstone, Tun, Marsh of Tun, and Storm Horns, and they all must be of your religion.
Restore Tethyamar
By restoring the fallen kingdom of Tethyamar, you'll reclaim a part of the dwarven legacy that has fallen to the many enemies of your people.
You must hold the counties of Tethyamar and Miir, and at least one of Mhaelos and the Lost Vale of Tarkhaldale, and those that you hold must be of your religion.
Establish Dwarfhold
Establish this area as a proper dwarfhold, one of the permanent fotress-homes of dwarvenkind with all that entail, to be held forever against the enemies of the stout folk.
Restore Dwarfhold
It will take work and resources to restore this fallen dwarfhold to its former glory, but once complete it will stand tall again as one of the bastions of your people.
Restore Sarphil
By restoring the fallen kingdom of Sarphil, you'll reclaim a part of the dwarven legacy that has fallen to the many enemies of your people.
You must hold the counties of Hulburg, Galenarr, Mulmaster, and Hillsfar, and they all must be of your religion.
Rally Raiders
Gather together a band of "uncivilized" raiders and reavers to sack and loot under your banner.\n\n
column3: §Note§:these raiders cost 75% of normal maintenance and take attrition.

column2: Rally Warriors
Gather together a band of "uncivilized" warriors to fight under your banner.\n\n
column3: §Note§:these warriors cost normal maintenance and take attrition.

column2: Must wait a year before calling forth another army.
Cannot have an army of this type active.
Organize Levies
Use your martial training to aid the levies of this region become better organized and, thus, a better fighting force.
Must wait 4 years between uses.
Organize Levies
Use your martial training to aid the levies of this region become better organized and, thus, a better fighting force.
§RAttention§!: This decision is simply a reminder that this mechanic exists. Use it by right-clicking on a holding in a province you own.
Summon Spectator
The Kossuth Ruby allows its user to summon spectators to act as guardians for a period of time.
Not a Bard
Is a bard and has an instrument in inventory
Buy Instrument
A bard is little without an instrument. For a small fee, a mundane instrument can be yours.
Lay on Hands
Your powers as a holy warrior allow you to heal any minor wounds you end up taking, through nothing but faith.
Take a Sacred Oath
Paladins often take on a Sacred Oath that defines the rest of their life and shapes their divinely-granted powers.
Specialize in a type of terrain
Rangers can choose to become specialists in fighting in specific types of terrain at the expense of all others.
Bond with an animal
Rangers and druids, through their connection with nature, are able to bond with a particular animal to become their companion.
You can only change your focus every year.
Monastic Focus
Through meditation, monks are able to contemplate and focus upon a single attribute of their psyche, though it comes at the expense of others.
Cease Focusing
Restore balance to yourself by no longer prioritising a single aspect of your being.
Cultivate Longevity
Through arduous medidation and cultivation, you can use your qi to increase your lifespan.
Rally the peasantry
Though they lack training, peasants can be fierce fighters if properly motivated and given arms.
Can only rally the peasantry every year.
Hire Brigands
Hire a small army of brigands to raid and loot for you.
Take over local crime
The criminals of this region are running wild, and that presents an opportunity for you to take control of them.
Must wait 2 years after the modifier expires.
Increase Vigilance
Courtly life is full of intrigue and plots. You may increase your awareness of it through effort, though it can take a toll on the mind.
Can only launder funds every five years.
Launder Funds
Through creative accounting, you can divert funds  that would go elsewhere into your own coffers. You should be careful, however, since none will like it if you are caught.
Will cause a light ammount of psionic stress
Will cause an average ammount of psionic stress
Will cause a heavy ammount of psionic stress
Must be a journeyman psion or higher
Acess psionic powers
Gain access to your psionic powers.
Close psionic powers list
Regain access to your other decisions.
Manifest Mindblade
Manifest a blade of pure psionic power that you can use as a sidearm. It will fade away over time, but will always be with you until then.
Must be an expert psion or higher
Glamour
Shroud yourself in psionic glamour, appearing far more personable than before.
Heal Mind
§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rtargeted decision§!\n\nHeal the mind of your target, purging from them all mental afflictions.
Heal Mind
§GThis is merely a reminder that you have this spell as a §Rtargeted decision§!\n\nHeal the mind of your target, purging from them all mental afflictions.
All mental afflictions will be cured.
Empty your mind
The stress of overusing your psionics is overwhelming you. By clearing your mind, emptying of most thoughts, you can renew yourself at the cost of a temporary weakness.
Ascend to Elder Brain
Through unspeakable rituals, you may fill the gap in your colony and become an Elder Brain.
Not a wizard, sorcerer, bard or warlock.
Must follow an evil religion or god.
Dominate Mob
Use the powers of the clergy of Ilsensine to raise an army from the population of [Root.GetName]. They will not be particularly organized or effective, but will be cheap and numerous.
Awaken Psionics
Petition [Root.PsiGod] to grant you the ability to tap into your latent psionic power.
Had [Root.GetHerHis] brain devoured by $KILLER$.
Devour Brain.
Eat the brain of [Root.GetBestName], with the results depending on the quality of the grey matter.
Cannot have the benefits of a previous meal.
Force Efficiency
Make the population of [Root.GetName] work harder building up structures, whether they want to or not.
Extract Secret
Use the mental powers of the Ilseninian faith to rip out a deep secret of [Root.GetBestName] and use it as blackmail.\n§RThis will free the target!§!
Shatter Mind
Use the powers of Ilsensine to delve into the psyche of [Root.GetBestName] and twist [Root.GetHerHis] mind into uselessness.
Steal Knowledge

Rip knowledge out of the mind of [Root.GetBestName] for your own benefit, thanks to the clergy of Ilsensine. Be advised that all not of the faith will be horrified at this action, or at least its implications.
[Root.GetBestName] loses all current species traits
Reveal your draconic nature
You tire of hiding what you are - reveal your true state as a mighty dragon to the world.
Red Dragon
Green Dragon
Blue Dragon
Black Dragon
Amethyst Dragon
Ruby Dragon
Gold Dragon
Silver Dragon
Bronze Dragon
Brass Dragon
Copper Dragon
Shadow Dragon
Song Dragon
Steel Dragon
Reveal your true nature
You are secretly a disguised [Root.GetSecretID]. If you are feeling bold, you could reveal this to the world at large.
[GetLycanType]
[GetSecretDragonType]
vampire
fiend
lich
mistake - please report
Reveal your vampiric nature
You tire of hiding what you are - reveal your true state as a vampire to the world.
Establish vampiric dominance
Make your court known as a place where vampires rule over all, as they should.
Randomly generated courtiers have a chance of being either vampire spawn, still living or generic undead.
Sire Vampire
Grant [Root.GetBestName] the gift of vampirism.
Sire Vampire Spawn
Turn [Root.GetBestName] into one of your loyal spawn, whether [Root.GetSheHe] likes it or not. Be aware that there is a chance [Root.GetSheHe] might resist.
Feed on Blood
Go out hunting for fresh blood to gorge yourself on. Though there is no chance of being found by preying on the populace, it will still cause a stir.
Monster Attack
Some sort of monster has been preying on the populace lately.
Build Spelljammer Port
Spelljammer ports are required to construct and outfit spelljamming vessels, though they also are prohibitively expensive.
Purchase spelljammer
Purchase a spelljammer at one of the docks in your realm. Though these vessels come at exorbitant prices, they allow access to wildspace and beyond.
Board Spelljammer
Climb aboard your spelljammer, rally your crew and ascend into the Sea of Night to explore the wonders and perils of Wildspace.
Steer Spelljammer
Decide upon the next destination of your spelljamming vessel, or go home if you are in Toril's orbit.
Restore the Black Altar

The Black Altar, the highest position in the faith of the Dead Three is vacant. Such an insult to the gods cannot stand. If a powerful enough Triumvir ruler were to emerge, they could restore it... or, if a priest, take it for themselves.
Restore the Magistracy

The post of Magister is a most holy one, a wizard chosen by [Root.MystraLoc] herself. It is a shame, then, to see this storied position vacant. A pious ruler could be the catalyst needed for a new Magister to rise.
Summon Abyssal Army
Summon an army of demons to fight in your battles, though be aware that the magics binding them to the Prime are temporary. Yeenoghuran and Orcusian characters will summon undead troops, instead.
Summon Demon
Summons forth a demon to take part in your court. The demon is not bound to obey you, however, and may have its own plans.
Must wait a year between castings.
Possess Prisoner
Summon forth an abyssal spirit to take over the mind of [Root.GetBestName] and release [Root.GetHerHim] into the world.
Lay claim on [Root.GetName]
It is common for followers of orcish gods to lay claim on territories controlled others of the same faith, for their gods reward the strong.
Improve Appearance
The gods of joy and beauty urge their followers to present themselves as best as they can, and their clergies often instruct the faithful on how to best do that.
Must wait one year before using this decision again.
Must wait five year before using this decision again.
Take etiquette lessons.
Take etiquette lessons with a specialist in the area in order to improve relations with everyone.
Gender Alteration
Have a gender alteration spell cast upon, changing your physical sex until you do this again. Some spouses might ask for divorce over this.
Cultivate Gardens
The muhjari defends that nature should be shaped and organized to increase its beauty, and as such the followers of this faith are renowned for their great gardens.
Great Gardens
Syncretise with Triadic
Muhjari is a flexible faith, one that often takes aspects of those around it. By syncretising with a faith, you'll gain some of its features, but also gain its religious enemies.
Syncretise with Myriadic
Muhjari is a flexible faith, one that often takes aspects of those around it. By syncretising with a faith, you'll gain some of its features, but also gain its religious enemies.

Choose religious school
The followers of various enlightened faiths often subscribe to one of three theological schools, those of moralism, ethoism and pragmatism.

the Gods
Make offering to spirits
Make an offering to one of the great spirit beasts of Ulutiu, in order to gain their blessing.
Train in arctic warfare
The faithful of Ulutiu are expected to know how to survive and fight in the frozen lands their deity favours.
Must wait twelve years between every use of this decision.
Prepare for Iurit
Prepare for the ceremony of Iurit in the start of spring. To do this, you will go into seclusion until the end of winter in order to receive visions and portents from Ulutiu.
Must wait twenty years between every use of this decision.
Peform the Kaitotem

Perform the Kaitotem rite, where a young animal is captured and brought to the community, and must be tended to for a year until it is possessed by a spirit beast of Ulutiu. If treated well, it will bless you. If not, it will curse you.
You must control Dark Arrow
You must control Tholvarr
You must control Druarwood
You must control Winter's Edge
Found the Kingdom of Many Arrows
For too long the orcs of the North have been scattered and leaderless. By founding the Kingdom of Many-Arrows you can change that and finally create a homeland for your people.
You will demand the conversion of [Root.GetBestName] to your faith.
Is a member of a thieves' guild society.
Is a member of tyrannical society.
Is a member of a regional alliance society.
Is a member of a spy network society.
Establish a Catoblepas Ranch
Set up an area for the husbandry of the deadly catoblepas, that only your people know how to tame.
Brew the divinity potion
Brew the potion revealed to you by Talos, which will allow you to become a god.
Blood of Adventurers
You have drawn the blood of [Root.veladv.GetValue] adventurers.
You must capture and harvest the blood of nine different adventurers.
Harvest Blood
Harvest the blood of an adventurer, furthering your quest to godhood.
Recruit an [Root.AmaunatorLocAdj] Judge.
Recruit a Judge from the [Root.AmaunatorLocAdj] church to serve in your court.
Hold a Magic Symposium
Host a Symposium on Arcane Magic in your court, giving valuable experience to all arcane-users in it.
Can only hold a symposium every 10 years.
Can only gain Beshaba's Boon once a year.
Beshaba's Boon
Propitiate Beshaba in order to ward off bad luck.
